snippet: Apple is looking to Cisco Systems’ expertise in Internet networking gear in its latest effort to sell more iPhones and iPads to corporate customers.
lead_paragraph: Apple is looking to Cisco Systems’ expertise in Internet networking gear in its latest effort to sell more iPhones and iPads to corporate customers.

headline.main: Apple and Cisco Team Up on iPhone and iPad Sales
headline.print_headline: Apple And Cisco Team Up On Iphone and Ipad Sales
